info.description: Performance tracking for published content, including views, engagement, and AI generation metrics.

Views.description: Total number of views for this content.

Shares.description: Number of shares across social platforms.

GenerationTimeMs.description: Time taken by the AI agent to generate the content, in milliseconds.

AgentVersion.description: The version of the AI agent that created this content.

post.description: The blog post associated with these metrics.
